member.name: T:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Cache.IRequestCache
member.summary: A simple cache interface.

member.name: M:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Cache.IRequestCache.Add(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Add a request and its response to the cache.
member.param: The request url used to identify the cache item.
The MusicBrainz web service response stream.

member.name: M:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Cache.IRequestCache.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Test whether the cache contains an entry matching the given request url.
member.param: The request url used to identify the cache item.
member.returns: True, if a cache entry matching the request was found.

member.name: M:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Cache.IRequestCache.TryGetCachedItem(System.String,System.IO.Stream@)
member.summary: Try to find the cached response for given request url.
member.param: The request url used to identify the cache item.
The response stream read form cache.
member.returns: True, if a cache entry matching the request was found.

member.summary: A cache that does not cache anything.

member.summary: Gets the default instance.

member.name: T:Hqub.MusicBrainz.QueryResult`1
member.summary: Abstract base class for MusicBrainz queries returning lists (with paging support).

member.name: P:Hqub.MusicBrainz.QueryResult`1.Count
member.summary: Gets or sets the total list items count.
member.remarks: This might be different form the actual list items count. If the list was generated from a search request, this property will return the total number of available items (on the server), while the number of returned items is limited by the requests 'limit' parameter (default = 25).

member.name: P:Hqub.MusicBrainz.QueryResult`1.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the list offset (only available in search requests).

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
member.returns: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

member.name: P:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Resources.Constants.BrowseStatus
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to +official+promotion+bootleg+pseudo-release+.

member.name: P:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Resources.Constants.BrowseType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to +nat+album+single+ep+compilation+soundtrack+spokenword+interview+audiobook+live+remix+other+.

member.name: P:Hqub.MusicBrainz.Resources.Constants.ReleaseQueryParams
